messages.title: Re-elect
messages.content: Kevin Brennan, Welsh Labour candidate for Cardiff West

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports investing in police and firefighters.
Opposes privatisation and cuts, supports more doctors and nurses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving all children a chance to achieve
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to smaller class sizes and new schools.
Plans to add more police officers and make streets safer.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Provide and protect affordable homes for rent and sale
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Intends to build more council homes and ensure the right to buy.

issues.education: Commitment to smaller class sizes and new schools.
issues.health: Opposes privatisation and cuts, supports more doctors and nurses.

housing.content: Intends to build more council homes and ensure the right to buy.

images.caption: Kevin Brennan pictured in front of what appears to be a historical building or monument.
